home.title: KPMG XmlGenerator
home.purpose: KPMG Web Template is a template ASP Core web application, which provides easy way to start a new web project within KPMG. The structure, implementation and used technologies cover all internal requirements in the company, and are based on best practices, used in different projects. The purpose of the template is to boost initial creation of the project and to provide ready to use web application.
